thread.title: Britain: weak growth cast doubts on next BOE move

title: Britain: weak growth cast doubts on next BOE move
text:
Britain: weak growth cast doubts on next BOE move Friday, April 27, 2018 - 01:50
With UK GDP numbers for the first quarter pointing to a much sharper slowdown than expected, investors are cutting their bets on a Bank of England rate hike in May. Silvia Antonioli reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
With UK GDP numbers for the first quarter pointing to a much sharper slowdown than expected, investors are cutting their bets on a Bank of England rate hike in May. Silvia Antonioli reports.
